author: Phil Vickery
method: Place a quarter of the crushed biscuits into the base of a tall dessert glass. Drizzle over one tablespoon of honey, two tablespoons of blackcurrants and one tablespoon of the juice from the blackcurrants. Top with a third of the whipped cream. Repeat the layering process twice with the remaining ingredients. To serve, sprinkle the remaining crushed biscuits over the top of the dessert.
ingredients: ½ packet ready-made honey and oat biscuits, crushed,  ½ tin blackcurrants, drained, juice reserved,  3 tbsp clear honey,  150ml/¼ pint double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
